Scott (amụrụ na Septemba 14, 1951 ma ọ bụ na ngwụcha afọ 1950) bụ ónyé America eletrik blues, soul blues, gospel na soul singer, songwriter, record producer na telivishọn host. Jerry Wexler, kpọrọ Scott "otu ónyé na-agụ egwú nke Chineke". A họpụtara ya màkà itoolu Blues Music Awards, ya na Ray Charles, Patti LaBelle, Lou Rawls, John Lee Hooker, na Ohio Players kerịtala ihe nkiri ahụ.
N'oge ọ bụ nwata, ọ hụrụ ndị na-agụ egwú gospel dịka Shirley Caesar na Inez Andrews. Ọ bụrụkwara abụ na St
John Missionary Baptist Church. O mechara lekwasị ányà na egwu mkpụrụ obi mgbe ọ nụsịrị redio ụmụnne ya nwanyị
Scott malitere ịbụ abụ na klọb abalị mgbè ọ dị afọ iri na isii, ọ na-arụkwa ọrụ ọkachamara afọ abụọ ka e mesịrị

Alụmdi na nwunye na ịzụlite ụmụ atọ mere ka Scott tinye ọrụ egwu ya n'otu akụkụ, tupu ọ kpọlite ya mgbe ụmụ ya toro. Na mbido na-eme jazz, ọ laghachiri na blues na R&B ozugbo òtù nkwado ya, nke aha ya bụ Smoke, nọ n'ọnọdụ
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ gbụrụ-gbúrụ San Francisco, gụnyere oge dị ka ndị na-eme ihe nkiri n'ụlọ oriri na nkwari abalị a na-akpọ Slim's.
